attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. The BR-V features enhanced Honda SENSING active safety technology offering a broad range of driver assistance features and driver aids. This includes Collision Mitigation Braking System, Road Departure Mitigation, Adaptive Cruise Control, Auto High-Beam and Lane Keeping Assist System. The All-New BR-V is designed with simplicity in mind. Enjoy an uncluttered dash with high quality materials and finishes within the cabin, focusing on creating a comfortable space for all.

The BR-V also features a brand new 7-inch touch screen system with integrated Apple CarPlay and Android Auto Connectivity. The driver is presented with a 4.2" display located on the dashboard which provides them with various types of information, such as active Honda SENSING functions which can be adjusted via the controls on the steering wheel available in the Elegance. 

Warranty - 5 years/200 000kms
Service Plan - 4 years/60 000kms
3 years Roadside Assistance
